6256d43cb0590.Name: LLP012 List addresses to select from
6256d43cb0590.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display
	   ,uprn as name
  FROM (SELECT sao
  			  ,pao
  			  ,street_name
  			  ,town_name
  			  ,uprn
          FROM llpgcache 
         WHERE length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
           AND postcode != ''
           AND (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,' ',postcode) like concat('%',REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ','%'),'%'))) tmp
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

6262d0ae0f491.Name: GPR041 - list of Preferred method of contact
6262d0ae0f491.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT *
FROM (
SELECT 'phone' as display
		,1 as name
		,'dTe' as fltr
		,'dCi' as fltr2
		,'zz' as exc
UNION ALL
SELECT 'mobile' as display
		,2 as name
		,'dMo' as fltr
		,'dCi' as fltr2
		,'zz' as exc
UNION ALL
SELECT 'email' as display
		,3 as name
		,'dEm' as fltr
		,'dCi' as fltr2
		,'zz' as exc
UNION ALL
SELECT 'post' as display
		,4 as name
		,'dAd' as fltr
		,'zz' as fltr2
		,'pcNa' as exc
) lst
WHERE {subParam} not like BINARY concat('%', lst.exc, '%')
  AND ({subParam} like BINARY concat('%', lst.fltr, '%')
  		OR {subParam} like BINARY concat('%', lst.fltr2, '%'))","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

6256e25cdaee2.Name: LLP013 Selected value to fields inc text area address
6256e25cdaee2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select a.*
		,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='2',house_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='3',street_out
																							   ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='2',house_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='3',street_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='3',street_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(a.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,a.test as available
		,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''),
				if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''),
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AddrConcat
		,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', ' '),
				house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', ' '),
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AdTextArea_out
from (
select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected,
	CONCAT(if(length(sao)>0,1,'')
			,if(length(pao)>0,2,'')
			,if(length(street_name)>0,3,'')
			,if(length(town_name)>0,4,'')) as test
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}) a","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)"}

6262afe3906c5.Name: LLP029 Change to Use Customer Recorded
6262afe3906c5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"Select Comb.*
		,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='2',house_out
				,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='3',street_out
					,if(substring(Comb.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='2',house_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='3',street_out
				,if(substring(Comb.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(Comb.test,3,1)='3',street_out
			,if(substring(Comb.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(Comb.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,Comb.test as available
From
(select
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	IF({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	CONCAT(if(length({flat})>0,1,'')
			,if(length({house})>0,2,'')
			,if(length({street})>0,3,'')
			,if(length({town})>0,4,'')) as test
	,concat(if({flat} != '', concat({flat},', '), ''),
			if({house} != '', concat({house},', '), ''),
			if({street} != '', concat({street},', '), ''),
			if({town} != '', concat({town},', '), ''),
			{postcode},
			if({country} != '', concat(', ', {country}), '')) as AddrConcat
	,concat({flat}, if(length({flat}) > 3, '\n', if({flat} != '', ' ', '')),
			{house}, if(length({house}) > 3, '\n', if({house} != '', ' ', '')),
			if({street} != '', concat({street},'\n'), ''),
			if({town} != '', concat({town},'\n'), ''),
			{postcode},
			if({country} != '', concat('\n', {country}), '')) as AdTextArea_out
	,'ProcAi' as haveRun
Union select
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	'' as test,
	'' as AddrConcat,
	'' as AdTextArea_out,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun) as Comb
Where
	IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') = Comb.existSelected","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

6256e9029d71c.Name: LLP023 Confirm the entered address inc text area address
6256e9029d71c.Output_template: {"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'' ,concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ','') ,if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from( select aq.* ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='1',flat_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1 ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2 ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3 ,if(substring(aq.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4 ,aq.test as available ,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''), if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat(', ', country_out), '')) as AddrConcat ,concat(flat_out, if(length(flat_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), house_out, if(length(house_out) > 3, '\n', ' '), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,'\n'), ''), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,'\n'), ''), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat('\n', country_out), '')) as AdTextArea_out from ( select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer, CONCAT(if(length({flat_out1})>0,1,'') ,if(length({house_out1})>0,2,'') ,if(length({street_out1})>0,3,'') ,if(length({town_out1})>0,4,'')) as test) aq ) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,0) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,0) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,0) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[UBub]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: html 1
props.content:
{#testFormWarn}

Thank you for your interest in registering with our internal recruitment agency.

Assignments will vary from short to long-term, and up to 37 hours per week.

To ensure we match your skills/experience promptly and accurately, please complete this form in as much detail as possible.

When we have received your form a selection process will take place and we will contact you accordingly.

props.label: html 17
props.content:
Privacy notice

Portsmouth City Council will process your personal information appropriately and legally in accordance with the relevant national legislation. The details you provide will be held in a secure system or database and will only be shared with other organisations where the law allows.

We may be required by law to disclose your personal information without your consent for the purposes of protecting the council's legitimate interests (for example to recover debts that are owed to Portsmouth City Council), to fulfil a legal obligation (such as bringing empty properties back into use) or for the purposes of preventing or detecting crime/fraud or apprehending and prosecuting offenders (for example to the Police, the Cabinet Office or Department for Work and Pension or as part of the National Fraud Initiative) or where we have a statutory duty to do so. For more information visit the National Fraud Initiative.

Portsmouth City Council uses an online form service supplied by Granicus.

Granicus does not use your personal information for anything other than providing the service to the Council and will not pass on your information for promotional purposes to any other person or organisation (third parties).

For more information about how Granicus uses personal information, view the Granicus govService Subscriber Privacy Policy
For more information about how Portsmouth City Council uses personal information, view the Council's Data Protection Privacy Notice

props.label: html 5
props.content:
Please provide the name and address of your two employment referees. One of these must be your present/most recent employer. If you have been in your present job for less than six months, please give details of your previous employer in addition to your current employer. Relatives or friends should not be named as referees.

We reserve the right to contact any previous employer with your consent to provide a reference and not just those below. Referees will be asked to provide details of any formal or informal disciplinary action against you.

Referees are normally asked for references prior to interview.

props.label: html 2
props.content:
POLICY STATEMENT ON THE RECRUITMENT AND SELECTION OF EX-OFFENDERS

The city council will make all efforts to prevent discrimination against any of its staff, potential staff or users of its services, regardless of race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, age, disability or offending background that does not create risk to children and vulnerable adults.

The city council complies fully with the Disclosure and Barring Code of Practice

The city council ensures that all those involved in the recruitment and selection process are suitably trained. We also ensure that they have received appropriate guidance and training in the relevant legislation, e.g. the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974.

The city council will ensure that an open and measured discussion takes place at interview regarding any offences or other matters relevant to the post. Failure to reveal information that is directly relevant and unfiltered to the post may lead to an offer being withdrawn or dismissal if already in post.

The city council undertakes to discuss any matter revealed with the applicant before making a decision not to appoint.

Having a criminal record will not necessarily bar applicants from working with the city council. This will depend on the nature of the position and the circumstances and background of the offences.

This post is not exempt from the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act. We only ask applicants to disclose convictions which are not yet spent under the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974. If you are not sure whether your convictions are spent, please contact Nacro for further advice.

Certain posts will require an enhanced disclosure and barring check. You will be asked to complete a separate form in that instance.
